sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The ALSA Utilities package contains aconnect, alsactl, alsamixer, amixer, aplay, arecord and aseqnet.

sect3.title: aconnect
sect3.para: aconnect is a utility for connecting and disconnecting two existing ports in the ALSA sequencer system.

sect3.title: alsactl
sect3.para: alsactl is used to control advanced settings for the ALSA soundcard drivers.

sect3.title: alsamixer
sect3.para: alsamixer is an ncurses-based mixer program for use with the ALSA soundcard drivers.

sect3.title: amixer
sect3.para: amixer allows command-line control of the mixers for the ALSA soundcard drivers.

sect3.title: aplay
sect3.para: aplay is a command-line soundfile player for the ALSA soundcard drivers.

sect3.title: arecord
sect3.para: arecord is a command-line soundfile recorder for the ALSA soundcard drivers.

sect3.title: aseqnet
sect3.para: aseqnet is an ALSA sequencer client which sends and receives event packets over a network.
